item.title: HowTo: SNAT/IP Masquerade between 2 wlan cards on Linux
item.description: Although this is a quite minimalistic howto you should be able to do IP masquerading between your WLAN cards in less than 2 minutes. As I posted here I’d like to share use my WLAN cards to share one cards Internet connection with the other one. The following steps don’t apply only to wifi cards. The same commands should work on Ethernet cards too. Let’s start… The Big picture As you see you have 2 networks:
